TopicTitle: Where are the telescope mount truss pieces in BDB?

Articles.Content:
Like here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lm8e4qVoXmM

The things that move the telescope from its launch configuration to on top of the station.

Can't find them anywhere. Don't want to have to launch a bulky rocket.

On 10/1/2019 at 7:15 PM, zit said:

Like here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lm8e4qVoXmM

The things that move the telescope from its launch configuration to on top of the station.

Can't find them anywhere. Don't want to have to launch a bulky rocket.

The BDB telescope was made before robotics were widely supported, it has its own probe core built in. Once you're in orbit, you can undock it and redock it to the proper node.
